name: Nothing's Pointless!
description:
Nothing’s Pointless! is a 2D puzzle platformer where you must cooperate with yourself. You and your best friend get lost in a haunted forest, where many daunting puzzles that require co-op from within await you. Just try to escape- the forest won’t let you two out without a fight! 

CONTROLS:

left mouse controls cyan cube

right mouse controls red cube

swipe mouse left and right to move respective cube

space makes respective cube jump

A and D control camera

r to reset scene

NOTE: There is one known bug with the game. The way the camera works, it can glitch outside of its bounds and into the cubes meant to contain it. You can reset, or you can inch your way out opposite the way you came in.
